item.title: About
item.description: Hello! I’m Shirley Shih, or you can call me 雪荔魚. Here is MY CV/中文履歷. 🎓 I just graduated from my master’s degree at National Taiwan University in the institute of Epidemiology and Preventive Medicine this year 📋 I’m willing to do side projects 💻 I’m interested in data analysis, coding, and stock. 🌝 My thesis topic

item.title: Project | 多人投資管理表
